snippet.title: Teaser - VeLM indie platformer
snippet.description:
Add to wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1058600/VeLM/ 

VeLM is an atmospheric adventure in Xibalba, the Mayan underworld, full of enemies and traps set by the Gods of Darkness. Unlock the secrets of the ancient myths, defeat the powerful Hun-Came and save the town of San Lamar from the curse.

DEMONSTRATED GAMEPLAY IS NOT THE FINAL VERSION.
TRAILER WAS CREATED BY THE «GMS Lab» TEAM.
ALL RIGHTS TO «VeLM» AND THE AUDIO-VISUAL MATERIAL USED IN THE VIDEO BELONG TO «GMS Lab».

Special thanks to:
Assistant 2D-designer – Alyona Sokolova https://www.artstation.com/anruz
Visual FX – mr_Smi1ey - https://twitter.com/mr_Smi1ey
Sound FX – Sergey Crimson - https://www.instagram.com/capitancrimson/
Soundtrack – Pauline Kubicheskaya - https://soundcloud.com/psckmr6mofuv
Paul The Tortoise - https://soundcloud.com/paulthetortoise

Video editing by shy_911 / White Shadow group - https://www.youtube.com/c/WhiteShadowGroup
